Rakitic is closer than ever to staying in Barça. Despite him still being a bit interested, his interest in playing in Serie A for Inter Milan has toned down a lot, especially due to Valverde's recent comments and the fact that EV deems him indispensable for his project. [GdS]

Moreover, his family, more specifically his wife, loves Barcelona and wants to stay.

[Gazzetta dello Sport, 🥈]

虎撲4月29日訊西班牙足協今天大會上正式通過了對於西班牙超級杯和國王杯的改制計劃，從下個賽季開始超級杯改為四角賽，由本賽季國王杯前兩名和聯賽前兩名參加(若出現重疊按照聯賽排名遞補)，同時，國王杯在半決賽前全部改為單一回合決勝負。

超級杯：將目前的西班牙國王杯與聯賽勝者在賽季初單場決勝​​負制，改為在2020年1月8-12日舉行由本賽季國王杯前兩名與聯賽前兩名參加的四角賽，由國王杯冠軍迎戰聯賽亞軍，聯賽冠軍迎戰國王杯亞軍，勝者之間進行決賽決出最終的冠軍。

國王杯：將目前的20西甲+22西乙+4個西乙B小組的前5名+18個西丙小組第一的參賽制度改為：20西甲+22西乙+4個西乙B小組的各自前7名+18個西丙小組第一+14個西丙係數最高的球隊+西班牙足協杯前4名+20個地區聯賽冠軍進行淘汰賽決出的最終前10名。進行6輪淘汰賽，半決賽之前全部為單場決勝負制度，最終的決賽在2020年4月18日舉行。

Kevin Prince Boateng has admitted that he thought he was being asked to join Espanyol when his January move to Barcelona surfaced, joking that he has the 'best agent in the world'.

"[The transfer to Barcelona] went also very fast for me. I just have the best agent in the world," he told ​Goal and DAZN. "He called me one day and said, 'You have to play well against Inter, someone is watching.' But he didn't tell me who is watching. Even Roberto De Zerbi, my coach at Sassuolo, came to me before the match and said I had to play well because the game was very important.

"So I had pressure from all sides. But under pressure I play best. I was the best man on the pitch and after the game my agent came to me and said, 'We're going to ​Barcelona!' I thought he meant Espanyol. But he immediately said, 'No, the right ones.' That was incredible. I could not believe it until the sporting director called me."

該報更稱，巴塞教練華維迪還特意花了逾 24 小時的時間，觀看利物浦的比賽錄影，更吩咐教練團隊重點研究 5 名紅軍球員，他們分別是沙拿、法明奴、沙迪奧文尼、阿諾和安祖羅拔臣。

http://www.espn.com/soccer/uefa-champions-league/story/3838310/barcelona-to-copy-guardiolas-city-against-liverpool-in-champions-league-sources

As reported by Catalan daily ​Mundo Deportivo, the defender is believed to prefer a move to Camp Nou, following in the footsteps of his teammate Frenkie de Jong, who will make the move to Barça at the end of this season after confirming his €75m move in January.


This transfer would make a lot of sense. The footballing philosophies of both clubs are very similar, and De Ligt's transition to the Barcelona style of play would be fairly seamless.

However, the 19 year-old's agent Mino Raiola is believed to prefer a move elsewhere, with ​Juventus, ​Manchester United and ​Bayern Munich all interested in the centre back's signature.

Raiola's motivation behind this is due to the greater financial gain that a move to these clubs would bring.
